title: Patching issues
body: So on part 1/2 in the patch, I download around 3000-4000 Kbps, but when I get to part 2/2, it plummets down to around 300-400 kbps. Any help? I have peer-to-peer turned off and I uninstalled the Panda Media Booster thing. A quick reply would also be appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body: Damn, you still have panda media booster installed?  It's no biggie, but that hasn't been used in a long time!  It sounds like your network might be having an issue holding a strong connection.  I'd recommend going every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection and get things downloading.  Hope that helps!
Alright. Thanks for the help. I'll see if it works :D
